short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension hides the View tweets button on profiles of and the View button for tweets by people you've blocked on Twitter

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Source code:
https://gitlab.com/dpeukert/true-twitter-block

Changelog:
1.0.3 - 2024/05/28 - fixed broken functionality due to changes on Twitter's side (thanks to @midnightfeline85 for the report)
1.0.2 - 2023/12/09 - fixed blocked tweet labels, added x.com domain
1.0.1 - 2022/04/03 - fixed View button for blocked tweets not being hidden when viewing a photo
1.0.0 - 2022/04/02 - initial version
